get_services.Name: get_services
get_services.Description: Return a list of hed services commands with descriptions

Returns.Name: supported_services
Returns.Description: A list of available services with description, parameters and return values.

process_events.Name: process_events
process_events.Description: Process a BIDS events file with JSON sidecars (passed as string)

Parameters.Name: command
Parameters.Description: Operation to perform. Must be validate

Parameters.Name: hed_version
Parameters.Description: Version of HED to be used in processing

Parameters.Name: json_dictionaries
Parameters.Description: A list of BIDS JSON sidecars as strings

Returns.Name: hed_version
Returns.Description: Version of HED used to validate

validate_json.Name: validate_json
validate_json.Description: Validate a BIDS JSON sidecar (in string form) and return errors

Parameters.Name: hed_version
Parameters.Description: Version of HED to be used to validate

Returns.Name: hed_version
Returns.Description: Version of HED used to validate

validate_spreadsheet.Name: validate_spreadsheet
validate_spreadsheet.Description: Validate a spreadsheet (tsv string) with HED tags in specified columns

Parameters.Name: hed_version
Parameters.Description: Version of HED to be used to validate

Parameters.Name: hed_columns
Parameters.Description: A list of column numbers (starting with 1) of columns containing HED strings. If empty, all columns are validated.

Returns.Name: hed_version
Returns.Description: Version of HED used to validate

validate_strings.Name: validate_strings
validate_strings.Description: Validate a list of HED strings and return errors

Parameters.Name: hed_strings
Parameters.Description: List of hed strings to be validated

Parameters.Name: hed_version
Parameters.Description: Version of HED to be used to validate

Returns.Name: hed_version
Returns.Description: Version of HED used to validate
